channel.title: Lessons From the Brink: The Sermons and Devos of Jim Brinkerhoff
channel.description: Jim Brinkerhoff taught at the Auburn Christian Student Center for over three decades. Those who heard him teach not only had their understanding of Christianity changed, but they had their lives transformed. Each week, we will broadcast one lesson -- sermons, Devos, and classes.
channel.itunes:author: Jim Brinkerhoff
channel.itunes:summary: Jim Brinkerhoff taught at the Auburn Christian Student Center for over three decades. Those who heard him teach not only had their understanding of Christianity changed, but they had their lives transformed. Each week, we will broadcast one lesson -- sermons, Devos, and classes.
channel.itunes:keywords: Christianity, Religion, Campus Ministry, Church of Christ, Auburn University

image.title: Lessons From the Brink: The Sermons and Devos of Jim Brinkerhoff

item.title: Holy Spirit: Class 5
item.description: The fifth class in Jim's midweek class on the Holy Spirit. For many years, Jim taught this class yearly as part of the Auburn Christian Student Center's midweek class offerings.
item.itunes:summary: The fifth class in Jim's midweek class on the Holy Spirit. For many years, Jim taught this class yearly as part of the Auburn Christian Student Center's midweek class offerings.
item.itunes:keywords: Christianity, Religion, Campus Ministry, Church of Christ, James

item.title: Reign of God
item.description: The seventeeth sermon in Jim's sermon series on James. The passage is James 5:17-18. Preached at Auburn Church of Christ on June 29, 2010.
